member_var.var: SELECT EO.EOMGNO AS EOMGNO , EO.EOMGGTMGNO AS EOMGJIBUCD , EO.EOYEAR AS EOYEAR , EO.EOTCCOURSECD AS TCCOURSECD , EO.EOEXAMORDERGUBUN AS EOEXAMORDERGUBUN , EO.EOEXAMORDER AS EOEXAMORDER , EO.EOEPMGNO AS EPMGNO , ER.ERUSEYN AS USE_YN , ER.EREXAMROOM AS EREXAMROOM , ER.ERNUMTYPE AS ERNUMTYPE , JB.GTDEPTNM + '지부 ' + EO.EOYEAR + ' ' + TC.TCCOURSENM + ' ' + EO.EOEXAMORDER + '회차' AS EXAMNM , JB.GTTEAMNM AS JJIBUNM , TC.TCCOURSENM AS TCCOURSENM FROM EXAMROOM ER , EXAMORDER EO , G_TEAMCODE JB , TRAININGCOURSE TC WHERE ER.EREOMGNO = EO.EOMGNO AND EO.EOMGGTMGNO = JB.GTMGNO AND EO.EOTCCOURSECD = TC.TCCOURSECD AND TC.TCSEARCHGUBUN = 'E' AND EO.EOMGNO = :EOMGNO
